tool_description: Generates domain name suggestions based on keywords, business type, and preferences using various naming strategies.

business_type.description: Type of business or website purpose

max_length.description: Maximum character length for generated domains

generation_count.description: Number of domain suggestions to generate

error_messages: Invalid keywords: Provide 1-10 non-empty keyword strings.
Invalid business type: Provide a non-empty business type description.
Invalid max_length: Must be between 3 and 63 characters.
Invalid generation_count: Must be between 1 and 100.
usage: Provide keywords and business_type to generate domain suggestions. Optionally customize max_length, include_hyphens, include_numbers, and generation_count for tailored results.

generated_domains.description: List of generated domain name suggestions
